tagblock.name: Deprecated AI Globals
tagblock.tooltip: This block is obsolete as it was moved to its own AI Globals tag, referenced below this block.

float32.name: AI Infantry-On-AI Weapon Damage Scale
float32.tooltip: Global scale on weapon damage made by AI on other AI

float32.name: AI Vehicle-On-AI Weapon Damage Scale
float32.tooltip: Global scale on weapon damage made by AI in a vehicle on other AI

float32.name: AI Player Vehicle-On-AI Weapon Damage Scale
float32.tooltip: Global scale on weapon damage made by AI in a vehicle with the player on other AI

tagblock.comment: The maximum ranges to which firing point evaluations will do pathfinding searches. INCREASING THESE VALUES WILL ALMOST CERTAINLY HAVE A NEGATIVE IMPACT ON PERFORMANCE.

float32.name: Scary Target Threshold
float32.tooltip: A target of this scariness is officially considered scary (by combat dialogue, etc.)

float32.name: Scary Weapon Threshold
float32.tooltip: A weapon of this scariness is officially considered scary (by combat dialogue, etc.)

float32.name: Invincible Scariness
float32.tooltip: when an actor's target is invincible, he is this much more scared

tagblock.comment: A few properties to help define when it is safe for a mission critical character to ressurect.

float32.name: Minimum Death Time
float32.tooltip: I will be dead for at least this long

float32.name: Projectile Distance
float32.tooltip: If there is a projectile within this distance of me, I'll stay dead

float32.name: Idle Clump Distance
float32.tooltip: If there is any enemy clump within this distance of me, I'll stay dead

float32.name: Dangerous Clump Distance
float32.tooltip: If there is any enemy clump with a status higher than idle within this distance of me, I'll stay dead

tagblock.comment: A few properties to help define when it is safe for a mission critical character to teleport.

float32.name: Cover Search Duration
float32.tooltip: The number of seconds that must elapse before we try to look for a firing point behind cover to teleport to.

float32.name: Task Direction Search Duration
float32.tooltip: The number of seconds we try to look for a firing point that aligns us with the actor's task direction.

tagblock.comment: Some values to help you control how much guys will throttle when they want to stick with the rest of their squad.

float32.name: Stop Distance
float32.tooltip: At this distance from the squad, stop.

float32.name: Resume Distance
float32.tooltip: At this distance from the squad, start again.

float32.name: Minimum Distance
float32.tooltip: Start throttling back at this distance

float32.name: Maximum Distance
float32.tooltip: Maximum throttle scale at this distance

float32.name: Minimum Scale
float32.tooltip: Minimum throttle value.

tagblock.comment: Parameters related to squad patrolling.

float32.name: Passthrough Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of passing through a patrol objective without pausing

float32.name: Search Phase Skip Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of skipping the search phase when stopped at a patrol objective

float32.name: Patrol Transition Timeout
float32.tooltip: If the squad takes more than this time to get to their new patrol point, cancel it and go on to the next.

float32.name: Patrol Maneuver Timeout
float32.tooltip: If the squad takes longer than this time to reposition within a patrol point (e.g. searching and pausing), cancel the point and go on to the next.

rangef.name: Patrol Search Firing Point Time
rangef.tooltip: spend this amount of time at a search firing position when in search phase

float32.name: Patrol Isolation Distance
float32.tooltip: If you are more than this distance from your nearest squadmate, you are officially isolated.

float32.name: Patrol Isolation Time
float32.tooltip: If you are isolated for more than this time, you get deleted.

tagblock.comment: These parameters control how the kung-fu circle works (i.e. when tasks have kungfu-count associated with them)

float32.name: Kungfu Deactivation Delay
float32.tooltip: When a task is disallowed from shooting, turn it off after this delay

comment.title: Presearch Child Counts (0 Means No Limit)

tagblock.name: Vision Traits
tagblock.comment: Traits that affect the AI's vision

float32.name: Vision Distance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the distance at which an AI can see their target.

float32.name: Vision Angle Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the angles of the AI's vision cone.

tagblock.name: Sound Traits
tagblock.comment: Traits that affect the AI's sound awareness

float32.name: Hearing Distance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the character's hearing distance.

tagblock.name: Luck Traits
tagblock.comment: Traits that affect the AI's luck

float32.name: Evasion Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of evading fire.

float32.name: Grenade Dive Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of diving from grenades.

float32.name: Broken Kamikaze Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of going kamikaze when broken.

float32.name: Leader Dead Retreat Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of retreating when your leader dies.

float32.name: Dive Retreat Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of retreating after a dive.

float32.name: Shield Depleted Berserk Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of berserking when your shield is depleted.

float32.name: Leader Abandoned Berserk Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of a leader berserking when all his followers die.

float32.name: Melee Attack Delay Timer Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the time between melee attacks.

float32.name: Melee Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the chance of meleeing.

float32.name: Melee Leap Delay Timer Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the delay for performing melee leaps.

float32.name: Throw Grenade Delay Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the time between grenade throws.

tagblock.name: Grenade Traits
tagblock.comment: Traits that affect the AI's grenade use

float32.name: Velocity Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the velocity at which AI throws grenades

float32.name: Throw Grenade Delay Scale
float32.tooltip: Scale the time between grenade throws.

range16.name: Search Pattern Cells Per Shell Range

float32.name: Transition Time
float32.tooltip: time it takes for the camera to move from the initial distance to the final distance

float32.name: Falling Death Transition Time
float32.tooltip: time it takes for the camera to move to its final position during a falling death

float32.name: Initial Distance
float32.tooltip: on the first frame after death, this is how far out of the body the camera will be

float32.name: Final Distance
float32.tooltip: how far from the body the camera will settle

float32.name: Dead Cam z Offset
float32.tooltip: how far above the body the camera focuses on

float32.name: Dead Cam Maximum Elevation
float32.tooltip: the highest angle the camera can raise to (prevents it from flipping over the vertical axis)

float32.name: Dead Cam Movement Delay
float32.tooltip: delay in tracking the killer

float32.name: Time To Auto Switch To Orbiting
float32.tooltip: how long the death camera lasts before auto-switching to orbiting camera

float32.name: Ignore Stick Time
float32.tooltip: how long the death camera ignores stick inputs and keeps turning towards the killer (should be non-zero because user could have died while running or looking around)

float32.name: Ignore Button Time
float32.tooltip: how long the death camera ignores shoulder button inputs and keeps turning towards the killer

float32.name: Dead Camera Minimum Falling Velocity
float32.tooltip: minimum velocity to switch to fell to death behavior (when biped is not actually falling to death)

float32.name: Maximum Boost Speed
float32.tooltip: the scaling factor for the left stick when the left trigger is fully depressed

float32.name: Time To Maximum Boost
float32.tooltip: seconds. while pegging boost, time to reach maximum speed

float32.name: Zoomed Field Of View
float32.tooltip: field of view when zoomed

float32.name: Zoomed Look Speed
float32.tooltip: scaling factor for look speed when zoomed

float32.name: Bounding Sphere Radius
float32.tooltip: radius of sphere for collision

float32.name: Flying Cam Movement Delay
float32.tooltip: how quickly the camera responds to the user's input

float32.name: Zoom Transition Time
float32.tooltip: how long it takes to zoom in or out

float32.name: Vertical Movement Time To Maximum Speed
Survival Switch Time
float32.tooltip: how long it takes in survival mode before switching to flying camera

float32.name: Orbit Cam Movement Delay
float32.tooltip: how quickly the camera responds to the user's input

float32.name: Orbit Cam z Offset
float32.tooltip: how far above the object's root node to position the camera's focus point

float32.name: Orbit Cam Minimum Elevation
float32.tooltip: lowest angle the camera can be moved to

float32.name: Orbit Cam Maximum Elevation
float32.tooltip: highest angle the camera can be moved to

float32.name: Maximum Playback Speed
float32.tooltip: how fast the film plays when the trigger is fully depressed

float32.name: Fade Out Time
float32.tooltip: how long it takes for the screen to fade out when rewinding

float32.name: Fade In Time
float32.tooltip: see above

float32.name: Enter Vehicle Transition Time
float32.tooltip: how long it takes the camera to move from first to third person when entering a vehicle

float32.name: Exit Vehicle Transition Time
float32.tooltip: see above

float32.name: Cylinder Fraction
float32.tooltip: controls how far from the focus point the outer raycasts start. 0 == cone, 1 == cylinder

degree.name: Obstruction Test Angle
degree.tooltip: how wide of a cone to test

float32.name: Obstruction Maximum Inward Acceleration
float32.tooltip: how quickly the camera moves inward when it anticipates a collision

float32.name: Obstruction Maximum Outward Acceleration
float32.tooltip: how quickly the camera returns to a normal position when its anticipated distance is further than its current

float32.name: Obstruction Maximum Velocity
float32.tooltip: maximum speed the camera can move

float32.name: Obstruction Return Delay
float32.tooltip: when the camera wants to start moving back out, wait this long before doing so

float32.name: Peg Threshold
float32.tooltip: [0,1] magnitude of analog input for pegged acceleration to kick in

point2.name: Pegged Time
point2.tooltip: time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect

point2.name: Pegged Scale
point2.tooltip: the maximum effect achieved over the duration of the pegged time.

degree.name: Peg Maximum Angular Velocity
degree.tooltip: the maximum turning speed during peg

float32.name: Peg Threshold
float32.tooltip: [0,1] magnitude of analog input for pegged acceleration to kick in

point2.name: Pegged Time
point2.tooltip: time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect

point2.name: Pegged Scale
point2.tooltip: the maximum effect achieved over the duration of the pegged time.

degree.name: Peg Maximum Angular Velocity
degree.tooltip: the maximum turning speed during peg

float32.name: Magnetism Friction
float32.tooltip: how much the crosshair slows over enemies

float32.name: Magnetism Adhesion
float32.tooltip: how much the crosshair sticks to enemies

float32.name: Inconsequential Target Scale
float32.tooltip: scales magnetism level for inconsequential targets like infection forms

float32.name: Fireteam Command Mode Duration
float32.tooltip: How long is command mode on after you initially attempt to issue an order

float32.name: Look Autoleveling Scale
float32.tooltip: 1 is fast, 0 is none, >1 will probably be really fast

int16.name: Minimum Autoleveling Ticks
int16.tooltip: amount of time player needs to move and not look up or down for autolevelling to kick in

degree.name: Minimum Angle For Vehicle Flipping
degree.tooltip: 0 means the vehicle's up vector is along the ground, 90 means the up vector is pointing straight up

float32.name: Minimum Action Hold Time
float32.tooltip: time that player needs to press ACTION to register as a HOLD

float32.name: Pegged Zoom Supression Threshold
float32.tooltip: for spinny-shotgun goodness

float32.name: Throw Channel Width
float32.tooltip: how close to an axis you have to be

float32.name: Throw Peg Threshold
float32.tooltip: how far from the center you have to be

float32.name: Throw Centered Minimum Time
float32.tooltip: how long the stick must be centered to start a throw

float32.name: Throw Drawing Maximum Time
float32.tooltip: how long you can take to become pegged at the start of a throw

float32.name: Throw Drawn Maximum Time
float32.tooltip: how long you can stay pegged at the start of a throw

float32.name: Throw Throwing Maximum Time
float32.tooltip: how long you can take to throw the stick to pegged on the other side

float32.name: Flick Peg Jump Maximum Time
float32.tooltip: max time you can be pegged and then press jump to activate

float32.name: Double Tap Interval Time
float32.tooltip: to engage double-tap, user must press jump twice in this much time

tagblock.name: Weapon Traits
tagblock.comment: Type any string from the relevant sections of multiplayer/globals.multiplayer_object_type_list.

tagblock.name: Movement Traits
tagblock.comment: This is a percentage, and can be any integer up to 400. -1 Is unchanged/default.

tagblock.name: Difficulty
tagblock.comment: scale values for enemy health and damage settings

float32.name: Easy Enemy Damage
float32.tooltip: enemy damage multiplier on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Enemy Damage
float32.tooltip: enemy damage multiplier on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Enemy Damage
float32.tooltip: enemy damage multiplier on hard difficulty

float32.tooltip: enemy shield recharge scale on hard difficulty

float32.tooltip: enemy shield recharge scale on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Normal Friend Damage
float32.tooltip: friend damage multiplier on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Friend Damage
float32.tooltip: friend damage multiplier on hard difficulty

float32.name: Easy Friend Vitality
float32.tooltip: friend maximum body vitality scale on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Friend Vitality
float32.tooltip: friend maximum body vitality scale on normal difficulty

float32.tooltip: friend maximum body vitality scale on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Friend Vitality

float32.name: Easy Friend Shield
float32.tooltip: friend maximum shield vitality scale on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Friend Shield
float32.tooltip: friend maximum shield vitality scale on normal difficulty

float32.tooltip: friend maximum shield vitality scale on hard difficulty

float32.name: Easy Friend Recharge

float32.name: Normal Friend Recharge
float32.tooltip: friend shield recharge scale on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Friend Recharge
float32.tooltip: friend shield recharge scale on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Friend Recharge
float32.tooltip: friend shield recharge scale on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Infection Forms
float32.tooltip: toughness of infection forms (may be negative) on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Infection Forms
float32.tooltip: toughness of infection forms (may be negative) on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Infection Forms
float32.tooltip: toughness of infection forms (may be negative) on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Infection Forms
float32.tooltip: toughness of infection forms (may be negative) on impossible difficulty

tagblock.comment: difficulty-affecting values for enemy ranged combat settings

float32.name: Easy Rate of Fire
float32.tooltip: enemy rate of fire scale on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Rate of Fire
float32.tooltip: enemy rate of fire scale on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Rate of Fire
float32.tooltip: enemy rate of fire scale on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Rate of Fire
float32.tooltip: enemy rate of fire scale on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Projectile Error
float32.tooltip: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Projectile Error
float32.tooltip: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Projectile Error
float32.tooltip: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Projectile Error
float32.tooltip: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Burst Error
float32.tooltip: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Burst Error
float32.tooltip: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Burst Error
float32.tooltip: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Burst Error
float32.tooltip: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy New Target Delay
float32.tooltip: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal New Target Delay
float32.tooltip: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard New Target Delay
float32.tooltip: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible New Target Delay
float32.tooltip: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Burst Separation
float32.tooltip: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Burst Separation
float32.tooltip: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Burst Separation
float32.tooltip: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Burst Separation
float32.tooltip: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Target Tracking
float32.tooltip: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Target Tracking
float32.tooltip: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Target Tracking
float32.tooltip: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Target Tracking
float32.tooltip: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Target Leading
float32.tooltip: additional target leading fraction for enemies. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Target Leading
float32.tooltip: additional target leading fraction for enemies. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Target Leading
float32.tooltip: additional target leading fraction for enemies. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Target Leading
float32.tooltip: additional target leading fraction for enemies. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Overcharge Chance
float32.tooltip: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Overcharge Chance
float32.tooltip: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Overcharge Chance
float32.tooltip: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Overcharge Chance
float32.tooltip: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Special Fire Delay
float32.tooltip: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Special Fire Delay
float32.tooltip: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Special Fire Delay
float32.tooltip: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Special Fire Delay
float32.tooltip: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Guidance vs Player
float32.tooltip: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Guidance vs Player
float32.tooltip: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Guidance vs Player
float32.tooltip: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Guidance vs Player
float32.tooltip: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Melee Delay Base
float32.tooltip: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Melee Delay Base
float32.tooltip: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Melee Delay Base
float32.tooltip: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Melee Delay Base
float32.tooltip: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Melee Delay Scale
float32.tooltip: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Melee Delay Scale
float32.tooltip: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Melee Delay Scale
float32.tooltip: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Melee Delay Scale
float32.tooltip: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on impossible difficulty

tagblock.comment: difficulty-affecting values for enemy grenade behavior

float32.name: Easy Grenade Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Grenade Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Grenade Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Grenade Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Grenade Timer Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Grenade Timer Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Grenade Timer Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Grenade Timer Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on impossible difficulty

tagblock.comment: difficulty-affecting values for enemy placement

float32.name: Easy Major Upgrade (Normal)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Major Upgrade (Normal)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Major Upgrade (Normal)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Major Upgrade (Normal)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Major Upgrade (Few)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Major Upgrade (Few)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Major Upgrade (Few)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Major Upgrade (Few)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Major Upgrade (Many)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Major Upgrade (Many)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Major Upgrade (Many)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Major Upgrade (Many)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on impossible difficulty

tagblock.comment: difficulty-affecting values for vehicle driving/combat

float32.name: Easy Player Vehicle Ram Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Player Vehicle Ram Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Player Vehicle Ram Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Player Vehicle Ram Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Trick Dodge Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Multiplies the chance that a flying vehicle will trick to dodge danger on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Trick Dodge Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Multiplies the chance that a flying vehicle will trick to dodge danger on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Trick Dodge Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Multiplies the chance that a flying vehicle will trick to dodge danger on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Trick Dodge Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: Multiplies the chance that a flying vehicle will trick to dodge danger on impossible difficulty

tagblock.comment: difficulty-affecting values for cover and bunkering

tagblock.name: Co-Op Difficulty
tagblock.comment: scale values for enemy health and shield settings

float32.name: Two-Player Shield Recharge Delay
float32.tooltip: multiplier on enemy shield recharge delay with two coop players

float32.name: Four-Player Shield Recharge Delay
float32.tooltip: multiplier on enemy shield recharge delay with four coop players

float32.name: Six-Player Shield Recharge Delay
float32.tooltip: multiplier on enemy shield recharge delay with six coop players or more

float32.name: Two-Player Shield Recharge Timer
float32.tooltip: multiplier on enemy shield recharge timer with two coop players

float32.name: Four-Player Shield Recharge Timer
float32.tooltip: multiplier on enemy shield recharge timer with four coop players

float32.name: Six-Player Shield Recharge Timer
float32.tooltip: multiplier on enemy shield recharge timer with six coop players or more

float32.name: Two-Player Grenade Dive Chance
float32.tooltip: multiplier on enemy grenade dive chance with two coop players

float32.name: Six-Player Grenade Dive Chance

float32.name: Two-Player Armor Lock Chance
float32.tooltip: multiplier on enemy armor lock chance with two coop players

float32.name: Two-Player Burst Duration
float32.tooltip: multiplier on the enemy shooting burst duration with two coop players

float32.tooltip: multipler on the enemy shooting burst separation with two coop players

float32.name: Four-Player Burst Separation
float32.tooltip: multipler on the enemy shooting burst separation with four coop players

float32.name: Six-Player Burst Separation
float32.tooltip: multipler on the enemy shooting burst separation with six coop players or more

float32.name: Two-Player Damage Modifier
float32.tooltip: multipler on the enemy shooting damage multiplier with two coop players

float32.name: Four-Player Damage Modifier
float32.tooltip: multipler on the enemy shooting damage multiplier with four coop players

float32.name: Six-Player Damage Modifier
float32.tooltip: multipler on the enemy shooting damage multiplier with six coop players or more

tagblock.comment: scale values for enemy projectile settings

float32.name: Two-Player Projectile Speed
float32.tooltip: multiplier on the speed of projectiles fired by enemies with two coop players

float32.name: Four-Player Projectile Speed
float32.tooltip: multiplier on the speed of projectiles fired by enemies with four coop players

float32.name: Six-Player Projectile Speed
float32.tooltip: multiplier on the speed of projectiles fired by enemies with six coop players or more

dataref.name: Grenade Aiming Function
dataref.tooltip: Determines the distance along the aiming vector to orient the grenade based on the camera pitch

float32.name: Seconds to Start
float32.tooltip: how long you must be pegged before you gain momentum

float32.name: Seconds to Full Speed
float32.tooltip: how long you must have momentum before you reach top speed

float32.name: Decay Rate
float32.tooltip: how fast being unpegged decays the timer (seconds per second)

float32.name: Full Speed Multiplier
float32.tooltip: how much faster we actually go when at full momentum

float32.name: Sprint Turn Multiplier
float32.tooltip: how much faster to turn when sprinting

float32.name: Minimum Player Velocity To Be Considered In A Momentum State
Look Window Length
float32.tooltip: period of time over which we record the biped's look angle for deciding if we should drop him out of momentum

float32.name: Terminal Velocity
float32.tooltip: you die if you fall faster than this (non-multiplayer only)

tagref.name: Default Damage Response
tagref.tooltip: fall back if none is specified in damage effect tags

float32.name: Player Shield Spillover
float32.tooltip: the minimum amount of shield vitality needed to prevent spillover from damage types that do not spillover.

float32.name: Current Damage Decay Delay
float32.tooltip: current damage begins to fall after a time delay has passed since last the damage (MAX 4.1, because timer is stored in a char so 127 ticks maximum)

float32.name: Current Damage Decay Time
float32.tooltip: amount of time it would take for 100% current damage to decay to 0

float32.name: Current Damage Decay Rate
float32.tooltip: amount of damage that decays from our current damage every second

float32.name: Recent Damage Decay Delay
float32.tooltip: recent damage begins to fall after a time delay has passed since last the damage (MAX 4.1, because timer is stored in a char so 127 ticks maximum)

float32.name: Recent Damage Decay Time
float32.tooltip: amount of time it would take for 100% recent damage to decay to 0

float32.name: Current Damage Decay Delay
float32.tooltip: current damage begins to fall after a time delay has passed since last the damage (MAX 4.1, because timer is stored in a char so 127 ticks maximum)

float32.name: Current Damage Decay Time
float32.tooltip: amount of time it would take for 100% current damage to decay to 0

float32.name: Current Damage Decay Rate
float32.tooltip: amount of damage that decays from our current damage every second

float32.name: Recent Damage Decay Delay
float32.tooltip: recent damage begins to fall after a time delay has passed since last the damage (MAX 4.1, because timer is stored in a char so 127 ticks maximum)

float32.name: Recent Damage Decay Time
float32.tooltip: amount of time it would take for 100% recent damage to decay to 0

float32.name: Current Damage Decay Delay
float32.tooltip: current damage begins to fall after a time delay has passed since last the damage (MAX 4.1, because timer is stored in a char so 127 ticks maximum)

float32.name: Current Damage Decay Time
float32.tooltip: amount of time it would take for 100% current damage to decay to 0

float32.name: Current Damage Decay Rate
float32.tooltip: amount of damage that decays from our current damage every second

float32.name: Recent Damage Decay Delay
float32.tooltip: recent damage begins to fall after a time delay has passed since last the damage (MAX 4.1, because timer is stored in a char so 127 ticks maximum)

float32.name: Recent Damage Decay Time
float32.tooltip: amount of time it would take for 100% recent damage to decay to 0

tagblock.name: Shield Boost
tagblock.comment: This feature was implemented for the engineer character in atlas. Shield dynamics overrides for when shields are being 'boosted' by an external source

float32.name: Shield Boost Decay
float32.tooltip: amount of shield-boost to decay per second

float32.name: Shield Boost Recharge Time
float32.tooltip: time to recharge full shields when getting boosted

float32.name: Shield Boost Stun Time
float32.tooltip: stun time when getting boosted

tagblock.name: Materials

stringid.name: Wet Material
stringid.tooltip: When rained on, report this material instead.

tagblock.comment: objects of this flotation category have this density relative to being in this material (1.0f==neutral)

flags32.name: Sweetener Inheritance Flags
flags32.tooltip: when a sweetener inheritance flag is set the sound\effect is not inherited from the parent material. If you leave the sweetener blank and set the flag than no effect\sound will play

comment.title: When this material is encounted under a material of this type ...
... we report it as this material

rangef.name: Subtitle Rectangle Width
rangef.tooltip: percentage towards the center - 0=default, 0.5=center of the screen

tagblock.name: Campaign Metagame Globals
tagblock.comment: 0 - Easy 1 - Normal 2 - Heroic 3 - Legendary

0 - Iron 1 - Black Eye 2 - Tough Luck 3 - Catch 4 - Fog 5 - Famine 6 - Thunderstorm 7 - Tilt 8 - Mythic 9 - Assassin 10 - Blind 11 - Cowbell 12 - Grunt Brithday 13 - IWHBYD 14 - Red Custom 15 - Yellow Custom 16 - Blue Custom

float32.name: Transient Score Time
float32.tooltip: how long does transient score stay onscreen

float32.name: EMP Kill Window
float32.tooltip: time after taking a guys shields down with emp damage you have to get the emp kill bonus (seconds)

stringid.name: Global Water Material
stringid.tooltip: the default value for what material type water is

stringid.name: Global Air Material
stringid.tooltip: the default value for what material type air is

float32.name: Biped Speed Reference
float32.tooltip: for bipeds, the speed at which you are on the far right of the 'speed to max camo' graph

float32.name: Vehicle Speed Reference
float32.tooltip: for vehicles, the speed at which you are on the far right of the 'speed to max camo' graph

float32.name: Camo Value For Game Name
float32.tooltip: minimum active camo percentage at which a player's game name will start becoming visible

dataref.name: Camo Value to Transparency Function
dataref.tooltip: Maps active-camo percentage to alpha for THIRD PERSON rendering

float32.name: Grenade Throw Penalty
float32.tooltip: reduces camo value by this much when throwing a grenade

float32.name: Melee Penalty
float32.tooltip: reduces camo by this much when meleeing

float32.name: Minimum Dinged Value
float32.tooltip: when taking damage or doing other actions that reduce camo, we will never drop below this value

float32.name: Interpolation Time
float32.tooltip: time it takes to interpolate from 0.0 to 1.0

tagblock.name: Garbage Collection
tagblock.comment: time before the game considers that following entities as garbage

tagblock.name: Runtime Materials

stringid.name: Wet Material
stringid.tooltip: When rained on, report this material instead.

tagblock.comment: objects of this flotation category have this density relative to being in this material (1.0f==neutral)

flags32.name: Sweetener Inheritance Flags
flags32.tooltip: when a sweetener inheritance flag is set the sound\effect is not inherited from the parent material. If you leave the sweetener blank and set the flag than no effect\sound will play

comment.title: When this material is encounted under a material of this type ...
... we report it as this material
